content.question: Which of the following is the best example of corporatism?

choices.label: A leader who seeks support by granting favors or rewards to certain individuals
The liberalization of trade policy and protection of property rights
State control of important enterprises and industries
The sale of political offices or state assets to powerful non-state actors
State-sanctioned business or civil organizations meant to represent the public

content.answer: State-sanctioned business or civil organizations meant to represent the public
